name: Pediatric Mets
title: Pediatric Mets
subtitle: M Category
notes:
**Note 1:** For Ependymoma, Pediatric Staging is based on the presence or absence of mets based on the *Chang M* definition for metastases within the CNS at diagnosis for specific pediatric brain primary tumors.
* Use the following resources to find information on CNS involvement: imaging, laboratory reports, CSF lactate dehydrogenase (LD, LDH) test


**Note 2:** Code 00 for benign (behavior /0) and borderline (behavior /1) tumors.
footnotes: (1)	Aitken JF, Youlden D, O’Neill L, Gupta S, Frazier AL, eds. Childhood cancer staging for population registries according to the Toronto Childhood Cancer Stage Guidelines – Version 2. Cancer Council Queensland and Cancer Australia: Brisbane, Australia; 2021.
